name: Wacky Track
description:
It's the day of the big race and a calamity has jacked up the track!

Everyone's counting on you to fix it in time for the race to start.

Use pieces provided in the shape shelf to repair
the track and help the runner to finish the race!

Different every time you play!

A game by Zac Bruin and Whitaker Trebella

(FYI: The twitter links don't work for some reason in the web player)
